item.title: 波动性专家称，立即购买 S&P 500 指数下行保险
item.description: 美国股市刚刚从低点爆发性反弹。一些市场波动观察家说，不要太舒服了。【原文：US stocks just notched an explosive rebound from their lows. Don’t get too comfortable, say some of the market’s volatility watchers.】

item.title: 来自中国的包裹激增，法国要求对小包裹收费
item.description: 法国正在推动对特姆优和申银万国集团有限公司等中国折扣零售商的小包装商品征收关税，以阻止因美国实施全面关税而有可能加速的商品流动。【原文：France is pushing to slap fees on small packages from discount Chinese retailers including Temu and Shein Group Ltd. in an effort to stem a flow that risks accelerating as the US implements sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: Blackstone 支持的 Rover 收购 Gudog，进军欧洲宠物护理市场
item.description: 为宠物主人和遛狗者及保姆牵线搭桥的平台 Rover Group Inc.【原文：Rover Group Inc., a platform that connects pet owners to walkers and sitters, is buying Dublin-based marketplace Gudog as it eyes more buyouts and organic growth in Europe.】

item.title: 石油泄漏后，俄罗斯关闭了约 62 英里的黑海海滩
item.description: 俄罗斯关闭了约 62 英里（100 公里）的黑海海滩，因为 12 月发生了一起燃料泄漏事件，导致环境损失索赔约 10 亿美元。【原文：Russia shut about 62 miles (100 kilometers) of Black Sea beaches, after a December fuel spill that’s resulted in environmental damage claims of about $1 billion.】

item.title: 中国人寿利润上升，投资收益显示出韧性
item.description: 中国人寿保险股份有限公司（China Life Insurance Co.【原文：China Life Insurance Co. said profit rose 40% in the first quarter as client demand boosted policy sales and its investments showed resilience during a stock market decline.】

item.title: 中国石油因油气产量上升而利润增加
item.description: 由于产量增加抵消了油价下跌的影响，中国石油天然气股份有限公司第一季度利润上升。【原文：PetroChina Co.’s profits rose in the first quarter as increased output offset lower oil prices.】

item.title: 德意志银行称贸易动荡是赢得市场份额的机会
item.description: 德意志银行首席财务官表示，美国突然提高关税引发的动荡是银行从竞争对手手中抢夺业务的机会。【原文：The turmoil caused by the sudden hike in US tariffs is an opportunity for banks to grab business from competitors, according to Deutsche Bank AG’s Chief Financial Officer.】

item.title: 油价下跌影响产量增长，中国石油集团利润下降
item.description: 由于全球原油价格下跌，中国最大的海上原油钻探商中国石油天然气股份有限公司第一季度利润下降。【原文：Cnooc Ltd., China’s biggest offshore driller of crude oil, saw profits fall in the first quarter after a drop in global prices.】

item.title: 中央银行推高融资成本，土耳其里拉困境缓解
item.description: 土耳其里拉面临的压力正显示出缓解的早期迹象，土耳其央行正在推进更积极的紧缩政策，以缓冲国内政治和全球贸易风险。【原文：The pressure on Turkey’s lira is showing early signs of easing, with the central bank pushing ahead with more aggressive tightening to provide a buffer from domestic political and global trade risks.】

item.title: 德意志银行首席财务官称欧盟证券化改革将促进增长
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）首席财务官詹姆斯-冯-莫尔特克（James von Moltke）表示，欧盟关于贷款证券化的新规则将促进该集团的经济发展，因为它能使银行增加贷款。【原文：The European Union’s new set of rules on the securitization of loans is set to bolster the bloc’s economy as it enables banks to boost lending, Deutsche Bank Chief Financial Officer James von Moltke said.】

item.title: 欧盟最高法院禁止向外国富人出售 "黄金护照
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）希望将富裕的外国人吸引到美国的时候，马耳他针对富裕投资者的 "黄金护照 "计划却违反了欧盟关于公民身份的规定。【原文：Malta’s “golden passports” program for wealthy investors violates European Union rules on citizenship, the bloc’s top court ruled in a case that could have transformed the EU into a haven for affluent foreigners at a time when President Donald Trump wants to entice them to the US.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称消费者通胀预期接近一年高点
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）在考虑进一步降低利率时表示，3 月份欧元区消费者的通胀预期接近一年来的最高点。【原文：Inflation expectations of euro-area consumers approached a one-year high in March, the European Central Bank said as it weighs further reductions in interest rates.】

item.title: 非洲进出口银行为非洲 140 亿美元石油贸易融资
item.description: 非洲进出口银行启动了一项石油产品融资计划，为非洲大陆生产的高达 140 亿美元的燃料贸易提供资金支持。【原文：The African Export-Import Bank launched a petroleum product financing program to help fund the trade of up to $14 billion of fuel produced on the continent.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长西波罗内认为关税可能在短期内导致通货紧缩
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波隆（Piero Cipollone）表示，美国的贸易征税可能会在短期内拖累欧元区的通胀，因为它们会拖累全球的经济扩张。【原文：European Central Bank Executive Board member Piero Cipollone said US trade levies could weigh on euro-zone inflation in the near term as they drag down economic expansion around the world.】

item.title: 西班牙经济保持强劲，但停电给前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 西班牙以消费者为主导的经济在本季度再次实现强劲扩张，但本周的大停电可能会对经济增长造成影响。【原文：Spain’s consumer-led economy posted another strong quarter of expansion, but a massive blackout this week is likely to take a toll on growth.】

item.title: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 启动首次欧元债券销售
item.description: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 公司希望在本周二的首次欧元债券销售中筹集至少 25 亿欧元（28 亿美元）的资金，此前该公司刚刚在美国出售了 50 亿美元的债务。【原文：Google parent Alphabet Inc. is looking to raise at least €2.5 billion ($2.8 billion) from a debut euro bond sale on Tuesday, just after selling $5 billion of debt in the US.】

item.title: 在 Isaacs 迅速离职后，Entain 任命 David 为永久首席执行官
item.description: Entain Plc 表示，一直担任临时首席执行官的 Stella David 将长期担任这家英国博彩集团的首席执行官一职。【原文：Entain Plc said Stella David, who had been serving as interim chief executive officer, will take on the position at the UK gambling group on a permanent basis.】

item.title: 印度炼油商在五月贸易谈判前采购更多美国原油
item.description: 印度炼油商在两国下月举行贸易谈判之前一直在增加对美国石油的采购。【原文：Indian refiners have been boosting US oil purchases before trade talks between the two nations next month.】

item.title: 万事达卡基金会将斥资 3 亿美元援助非洲难民
item.description: 万事达基金会将斥资 3 亿美元，帮助非洲约 50 万难民完成学业，为他们提供就业途径。【原文：The Mastercard Foundation will spend $300 million to help about 500,000 refugees in Africa complete their education, giving them a pathway to jobs.】

item.title: 谈判仍在继续，Alphawave延长竞购高通截止日期
item.description: Alphawave IP Group Plc 表示，已将高通公司（Qualcomm Inc.【原文：Alphawave IP Group Plc said it has extended the deadline for Qualcomm Inc. to make a firm bid for the London-listed semiconductor company until May 12 to give the companies more time to discuss terms of a potential deal.】

item.title: AB 食品公司利润下滑，制糖业务恢复缓慢
item.description: 英国联合食品公司（Associated British Foods Plc）报告称，由于该英国企业集团的制糖业务出现亏损，调整后营业利润下降了 10%。【原文：Associated British Foods Plc reported a 10% decline in adjusted operating profit due to a loss at the British conglomerate’s sugar business.】

item.title: 印度计划在美国贸易谈判中强调波音订单管道
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，印度贸易谈判代表正计划展示该国大量的波音公司飞机订单，以及在寻求与美国达成有利协议的过程中可能出现的更多订单。【原文：Indian trade negotiators are planning to showcase the country’s large pipeline of Boeing Co. plane orders and the potential for more to come as they seek a favorable deal with the US, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 英国石油公司因利润不及预期和债务增加而削减回购计划
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）将季度股票回购额削减至 7.5 亿美元，处于目标范围的底部，因为油价下跌和债务增加对其资产负债表构成了考验。【原文：BP Plc cut its quarterly share buyback to $750 million, at the bottom of its target range, as lower oil prices and rising debt tested its balance sheet.】

item.title: 效率计划结出硕果，HelloFresh 盈利增至三倍
item.description: HelloFresh SE 表示，由于其增效计划初见成效，第一季度盈利增长了两倍多。【原文：HelloFresh SE said first-quarter earnings more than tripled as its efficiency program started bearing fruit.】

item.title: 尽管关税动荡，土耳其银行仍能找到更便宜的长期债务
item.description: 土耳其银行将在银团贷款市场上进行近十年来期限最长的借贷，一些投资者认为通胀放缓部分抵消了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税计划所带来的全球不确定性。【原文：Turkish banks are set to borrow at the longest maturities on the syndicated loan market in nearly a decade, with some investors seeing slower inflation partly offsetting global uncertainties caused by President Donald Trump’s tariff plans.】

item.title: 需求旺盛，中国铜市指标创 16 个月新高
item.description: 由于买家争相确保供应，衡量中国铜市场强度的一项指标已跃升至 2023 年底以来的最高点。【原文：A gauge of strength in China’s copper market has jumped to the highest since late 2023 as buyers scramble to secure supplies.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将连续第 12 个交易日上涨
欧洲央行卡扎克斯希望继续逐步降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克认为，欧洲中央银行应该能够继续逐步降低利率。【原文：The European Central Bank should be able to carry on with gradual interest-rate reductions, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 德意志银行债务交易因市场波动创下新高
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的交易部门在第一季度创下了历史新高，因为该银行从市场波动中获益匪浅。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG’s trading unit hit a record in the first quarter as the lender benefited from market volatility.】
